name: TJ: Out of control
description:
You are taking a driving test to get your drivers license in Tijuana! Be careful, try not to make too many infractions or you'll fail the test!, a few examples of infractions are:

Running over a "Burro cebra", hitting other cars, not using your blinkers or even hitting homeless people crossing the street.

Please view the controls menu beforehand.

Ps. Tacos are your friend A L W A Y S ;)
